EmailTemplate.name: 2015 August Newsletter (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: Holiday Season is coming - Safari365 August Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
African Summer 2015 is here – Join us this season
Dear [fname],
Time flies when you’re having fun. 2015 has been no different. And with that, end of year celebrations are once again upon us.
If you are still undecided as to what to do for your end-of year holidays, why not visit us in Africa? ( with the South African Rand at an all-time low, great value is to be has in South Africa) Here are a couple of cherry-picked list of last-minute packages to whet your appetite (which we can customize to your liking, of course):
Safari365 Old Marine Dr Foreshore, Cape Town, 8000, South Africa
Safari365.com View in browser
